DOC.brief_summary: Hypotension follow spinal anesthesia cesarean section serious problem . In study investigated effect vasopressor phenylephrine noradrenaline postspinal hypotension .
DOC.brief_title: Phenylephrine Noradrenaline Post Spinal Anesthesia Hypotension
DOC.detailed_description: On arrival operating room , 18g cannula insert monitor apply ( electrocardiography - pulse oximetry - non-invasive blood pressure monitor ) . Patients receive spinal anesthesia 500 ml rapid crystalloid co-load . Ten milligrams heavy bupivacaine addition 20 mcg fentanyl inject L3-L4 L4-L5 interspace use 25 g spinal needle sit position . After spinal block , patient randomly allocate one two group : - Phenylephrine group ( n=100 ) - Norepinephrine group ( n=100 ) Patients show SBP 140 mmHg heart rate 55 bpm first vasopressor dose receive infusion . The infusion stop SBP 140 mmHg heart rate 55 bpm . Patients position supine position leave lateral tilt . Block success assess use pinprick , patient fail block exclude study . The high sensory block level assess 5 minute intrathecal injection . Co-hydration continue till maximum 1.5 litre .
DOC.criteria: full term singleton parturients elective cesarean section cardiac morbidity hypertensive disorder pregnancy peripartum bleed body mass index > 35 exclude study
